text: How long does HubSpot need to add full support for Conversations API? API has been in beta for +1y now, and a bunch of features are missing (<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Tag-a-person-in-a-conversation-comment/td-p/810950|tag a person in comment>, <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/API-Assign-a-conversation-to-a-user/idi-p/811531|assign conversation to a person>), or are invalid/wrong (<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Incorrect-docs-Conversation-sort-threads/td-p/938929|sort threads>, <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Incorrect-docs-get-conversation-threads/td-p/938731|filter threads by status>). Is there a better way to get support, or are they really so terribly slow?
